verdict.reasoning: The Jury Agents have reached a consensus that the EU region requires geo-specific compliance logic due to data protection regulations such as GDPR (Report 1).

regulations.name: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
regulations.snippet: Article 5 - Principles relating to processing of personal data, notably the principle of data minimization.

regulations.name: ePrivacy Directive (ePD)
regulations.snippet: Article 5 - Security measures for the protection of electronic communications.
